name: Stephen SEDACH et al. v. TOWN OF NORTH PROVIDENCE et al.
name_abbreviation: Sedach v. Town of North Providence

parties: Stephen SEDACH et al. v. TOWN OF NORTH PROVIDENCE et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Decof & Grimm, John S. Foley, Providence, for petitioners.
Hanson, Curran & Parks, A. Lauriston Parks, (for C.E. Maguire, Inc.) Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Stephen SEDACH et al. v. TOWN OF NORTH PROVIDENCE et al.
No. 82-541-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Jan. 20, 1983.
Decof & Grimm, John S. Foley, Providence, for petitioners.
Hanson, Curran & Parks, A. Lauriston Parks, (for C.E. Maguire, Inc.) Providence, for respondent.
